subject: fix: codebase review round 2 — UX polish, accessibility, code quality
body:
UX: filter labels Inc/Exc→Include/Exclude, upload success toast, plain
language urgency labels, work hours color legend, security subtitle,
standardized empty states, improved error messages.

A11y: focus-visible outlines on interactive elements, tab active state
via CSS variables, tag contrast increased for WCAG AA, reduced motion
media query.

Code quality: error boundary inline styles→CSS classes, centralized
THRESHOLDS constants, deleted dead scripts/lib/manifest.js.

Infra: extract-api error.code fix, PWA glob patterns narrowed,
production sourcemaps disabled.
